page.title: 05A SMALL SCHOOL
page.content: The school is a small building.It has 7 children.There is a playground and a playing-field.When the children are 9 they leave this school and go to school on the Mainland.They start at this school at 4years and 6months. The school has 1 big classroom,but when the partition is over it makes 2 classrooms.There is a Canteen,a boy's cloakroom and a girl's cloakroom.The Headteacher is Miss M.Bushnell and the Part_time Assistant teacher is Mrs.I.M.Moody.There is one cook called Mrs.M.Douglas and a caretaker/cleaner called Mr.L.James. The 7 pupils in the school are Simon Massey,Jennifer Ward and Kirsty Patterson,all aged 9 years.James Douglas and Christopher Douglas are twins and are almost 8 years.William Massey and Elaine Johnson are 7 years old.
